name: ViveSpray
description: ViveSpray is a virtual reality graffiti simulator for HTC Vive.Notice: Requires a virtual reality headset. See the VR Support section for more info.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 4440+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Requires HTC Vive
